concept.title: Understand the Working Set
concept.shortdesc: Objects contained in the working set are components of selected references. ZWCAD extracts selected objects fromthe selected xrefs to edit in the current drawing, these objects having been extracted froma set called working set. Objects in working set can be changed and saved and the xrefs or block definitions can be updated.

conbody.p: When constructing the workingset, all the excluded objects of the working set may be fading displayed.
